dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S704 IS: Voluntary Public Access Improvement Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Daines (for himself, Mr. Bennet, and Mr. Marshall) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

form.official-title: To amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to reauthorize the voluntary public access and habitat incentive program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Voluntary Public Access Improvement Act of 2025.

section.header: Voluntary public access and habitat incentive program
section.text: Section 1240R of the Food Security Act of 1985 (16 U.S.C. 3839bbâ€“5) is amended by striking subsection (f) and inserting the following:

paragraph.text: Of the funds of the Commodity Credit Corporation, the Secretary shall use to carry out this section $150,000,000 for the period of fiscal years 2025 through 2029.

paragraph.header: Enhanced public access to wetland reserve easements
paragraph.text: To the maximum extent practicable, of the funds made available under paragraph (1), the Secretary shall use $3,000,000 for the period of fiscal years 2025 through 2029 to encourage public access to land covered by wetland reserve easements under section 1265C through agreements with States and tribal governments under this section.
